trans-unit.source: Creates instances of classes that inherit from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> class and implement the <xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: 建立繼承自類別的執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>類別，並實作<xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"></xref>介面。

trans-unit.source: Instances are created dynamically to handle requests for ASP.NET files.
trans-unit.target: 處理要求的 ASP.NET 檔案以動態方式建立執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The PageHandlerFactory class is the default handler factory implementation for ASP.NET pages.
trans-unit.target: PageHandlerFactory 類別是 ASP.NET 網頁的預設處理常式 factory 實作。

trans-unit.source: The PageHandlerFactory class implements the <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandlerFactory> interface to provide the default HTTP handler for ASP.NET files.
trans-unit.target: PageHandlerFactory 類別會實作<xref:System.Web.IHttpHandlerFactory>介面，以提供 ASP.NET 檔案的預設 HTTP 處理常式。</xref:System.Web.IHttpHandlerFactory>

trans-unit.source: The PageHandlerFactory calls the ASP.NET compilation system to compile, if necessary, and return the exact type corresponding to the URL, and then creates an instance of that type.
trans-unit.target: PageHandlerFactory 呼叫 ASP.NET 編譯系統來編譯時，必要時，並傳回精確的型別對應至的 URL，，，然後建立該類型的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The page type inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class and implements the <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 頁面類型繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>類別，並且實作<xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler>介面。</xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: To build a custom page handler factory, implement the <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandlerFactory> and register the custom PageHandlerFactory class in the Web.config file for the application in the [httpHandlers Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/24ca01f3-7141-4fdc-acac-71c0733cf6c2) configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 若要建置自訂的網頁處理常式 factory 實作<xref:System.Web.IHttpHandlerFactory>並註冊自訂 PageHandlerFactory 類別中的應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中[httpHandlers 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/24ca01f3-7141-4fdc-acac-71c0733cf6c2)組態區段。</xref:System.Web.IHttpHandlerFactory>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.PageHandlerFactory"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.PageHandlerFactory"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The PageHandlerFactory constructor is the default constructor and initializes any fields to their default values.
trans-unit.target: PageHandlerFactory 建構函式是預設建構函式，和任何的欄位初始化成為其預設值。

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"></xref> interface to process the requested resource.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的執行個體<xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"></xref>介面來處理要求的資源。

trans-unit.source: The GetHandler method is called by the ASP.NET run time and returns either a valid instance of the <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> interface or `null`.
trans-unit.target: GetHandler 方法由 ASP.NET 執行階段呼叫，傳回的有效執行個體<xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler>介面或`null`。</xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> class that provides references to intrinsic server objects (for example, Request, Response, Session, and Server) used to service HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>類別，提供內建伺服器物件 （例如，要求、 回應、 Session 和伺服器） 用來服務 HTTP 要求的參考。

trans-unit.source: The HTTP data transfer method (GET or POST) that the client uses.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 資料傳輸方法 （GET 或 POST） 用戶端使用。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path to the requested resource.
The <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.PhysicalApplicationPath*> property to the requested resource.
A new <xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"></xref> that processes the request; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref href="System.Web.IHttpHandler"> </xref> ，處理要求，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Enables a factory to reuse an existing instance of a handler.
trans-unit.target: 可讓重複使用現有的執行個體的處理常式的處理站。
